name: 10" Avenger Handlebars
description:
We designed these bars to work with your factory Street Bob cables and wiring lengths. These 1.25" bars have great ergonomics and just the right lines to give your bike the look you want without having to spends all the extra money on cables.  We designed these bars to have the proper base width to match up to Harley's Mid-Glide width front ends. Powder coated black for an extremely durable finish. Our Avenger bar is drilled for super easy internal wiring. 

MEASUREMENTS:

HEIGHT - 10"
PULLBACK - 4"
TOTAL WIDTH - 32"
BASE WIDTH - 10"

name: 2009 Dyna Super Glide Custom - SOLD!
description:
2009 FXD Dyna Super Glide Club Style Build
Low Rider Panel Style Custom Paint
Wood Performance TW-555 Cams
Torrington Inner Cam Bearings
Screamin' Eagle Premium Tapered Adjustable Pushrods
Dynojet Power Commander V w/ Fuel Moto Dyno'd Map
10" Chubby Risers
Speedster Handlebars
Accutronix Gauge Mount
OG Arlen Ness Fairing Kit For Mid Glides
Arlen Ness Fusion Grips
Arlen Ness Fusion Pegs
HD Chin Spoiler
Laydown Tag Bracket
Kuryakyn Panacea Taillight
Sway-A-Way Rear Shocks
RSD Avenger Seat
Powder Coated Engine Covers, Wheels & All Trim
Bassani 2-Into-1 Road Rage Exhaust
Joker Machine Air Breather

name: Chubby 10" Handlebar Risers For 1" Bars
description: Looking for the perfect length risers for your club style handlebar setup?  These 10" Chubby risers work perfectly with our Speedster handlebars (shown in the photos). The diameter of these risers is 1.25". These work perfectly with the Accutronix gauge mounts.  Available in gloss black or chrome.

name: Highway Peg Mounting Hardware
description: This kit allows you to mount your own choice of highway pegs to your Dyna chassis. The brackets in this kit utilize the forward control mounting location on the frame. Simply add your own pegs to complete the package.  Available in Chrome or Black Powder Coat.

name: Arlen Ness Headlight Relocation Bracket - Narrow Glides
description: This headlight relocation bracket repositions the headlamp on narrow glide Dyna models when using an original Arlen Ness fairing.

name: Roland Sands Design Avenger 2-Up Seat For Dynas
description:
The new Avenger pattern features raised padding with a perforated cover, sewn and formed in just the right places for a comfortable seat. The detailing of the perforated sections add the right amount of style to make it unique yet not overdone. 

Direct bolt on for 2006 and newer Dyna Models

Features:
Ergonomic shape keeps rider seated firmly & comfortably.
Black vinyl with black perforated sections
Controlled density polyurethane foam
Baseplate is marine grade fiberglass
RSD metal logo
Made in the USA

name: Modified OG Arlen Ness Fairing For Mid-Glide Dynas - Complete Kit
description:
We've taken the guess work out of adapting the original Arlen Ness fairings to the new mid-glide front ends found on 06 and newer Street Bobs, Super Glides and Low Riders.  Our kit comes complete with everything you need to mount your new fairing to the bike.  The upper mounts of the fairing are adjustable to allow the rider to fine tune the pitch and air flow of the fairing.  Fairing comes pre-trimmed in raw condition ready for paint.  The mounting clamps and headlamp relocation brackets are powder coated black for durability.

Available in Smooth Or Louvered

name: Arlen Ness Fusion Series Knurled Shifter Peg
description: This shifter peg matches the Fusion Series Knurled foot pegs we offer.  Simple as that.  Sold each.  Available with a chrome or black end cap.

name: Arlen Ness Fusion Series Knurled Foot Pegs
description: A simple yet custom looking foot peg that offers grip as well as stylish looks.  These rubber pegs get the job done at an affordable price.  Simple as that.  Available with a Black or Chrome end cap.  Matching knurled shifter peg sold separately.

name: Joker Machine Serrated Shifter Peg
description: This motocross inspired shifter peg matches the short serrated MX pegs that we sell perfectly.  Sold each.  Available in Black or Silver

name: Joker Machine Short Serrated MX Style Footpegs
description: The ultimate in grip and style for your Dyna.  No rubber surface to wear down or slip off of when it rains.  Set your bike apart from the crowd!  Sold in pairs.  Available in Black or Silver.

name: 39mm Fork Clamps
description: These bolt on clamps work in the 39mm fork tubes found on older Dynas. They can be used to mount turn signals or fairings. Available in gloss black or chrome. Sold in pairs.

name: Arlen Ness Mini Oval Mirrors
description: A simple clean mirror made by one of the OG's in the industry. Clean up the look of your handlebars with these well built mirrors.  Price is per pair.

name: 49mm Fork Clamps
description: These bolt on clamps work in the 49mm fork tubes found on newer dynas. They can be used to mount turn signals or fairings. Available in gloss black or chrome. Sold in pairs.

name: Bassani Road Rage 2-Into-1 - High Collector - Short Meg System
description: Dynas are known for their excellent handling.  Something to consider when purchasing an exhaust system for your bike is the amount of ground clearance you will have after installing your new system.  Bassani has created a perfect 2-into-1 system that has great looks and exceptional ground clearance.  The header is 1.75" and collects into a short 12" long muffler.  The system is very light weight and comes in triple plated chrome or ceramic coated black.  Heat shields are included!  FITS 1991-CURRENT YEAR DYNA MODELS.

name: Bassani Road Rage 2-Into-1 Exhaust System
description: Bassani is a proven name in the industry.  These pipes not only sound great but produce nice smooth curves on the dyno.  This pipe features stepped headers that merge into a 4" muffler body.  This system comes in ceramic coated black or triple plated chrome and comes complete with heat shields.  FITS 1991-CURRENT YEAR MODEL DYNAS

name: Racetech 49mm Front Suspension Spring Kit w/ Gold Valve Emulators
description:
This front spring kit is designed to improve the ride, comfort and handling of your 2006 & newer Dyna. This kit is offered at a special package price that is less than the individual components.

The kits allow the suspension to be customized for the rider. It includes a set of Gold Valve Cartridge Emulators, a pair of Hi-Performance Springs (.6-1.1 kg/mm progressive rate) and Lowering Hardware.

The Lowering Hardware allows the option to lower the front end 1"

name: Speed Merchant 49mm Spring Preload Adjusters
description: In our opinion, preload adjusters are one of the key components in a proper suspension setup.  The Speed Merchant is known for their well designed and engineered products.  Their spring preload adjusters allow you to fine tune the spring preload of your front suspension in just a moments time.  Offered in anodized silver or black.

name: Arlen Ness Knurled Rubber Grips - Cable Actuated
description: We like products that function well and look great.  Thats why we chose to offer Arlen Ness grips to our customers.  Anyone can run down to Harley and pick out a comfy set of Kuryakyn dildo looking grips that will only scream "I'm a total loser that likes blending in with the crowd".....If thats you, enjoy your ride to the stealership.  If that's not you and your factory grips look busted and abused then these are the grips for you.  These grips are made from knurled rubber and have a simple end cap....thats it.  Nothing that screams "look at my big stupid grips"!  Maybe you're into goofy looking grips and thats totally cool, but if you want a "less is more" approach to customizing your bike then these will get the job done.  They are extremely comfortable and look great.

name: Rifle Roadster Fairing For Dynas
description:
One of the best looking fairings you can put on your Dyna!  This fairing comes in primer ready to paint.  The windshield included with the kit is a 15" smoked shield and is perfect for most applications.  18" shields can be ordered separately from Rifle if you want more wind protection.  Most riders will enjoy the height of the 15" shield as it seems to fit the Dyna chassis perfectly. 

 ***FOR 2006 AND NEWER DYNA MODELS, YOU WILL NEED TO ORDER A SET OF 49mm CLAMPS IN ORDER TO MOUNT THIS FAIRING***

***FOR 2005 AND OLDER DYNA MODELS, THE MOUNTING HARDWARE IS COMPLETE IN THE BOX.  THESE KITS ARE DESIGNED TO WORK ON BIKES WHERE THE HEADLAMP IS FACTORY MOUNTED TO THE UPPER TRIPLE TREE***

options.name: 2006 & NEWER DYNA (HEADLIGHT MOUNTS ON LOWER TRIPLE TREE)
2005 & OLDER DYNA (HEADLAMP MOUNTS ON TOP TRIPLE TREE)

name: 6.5" Forged Aluminum Risers For 1" Bars
description:
Made from high quality 6061 forged aluminum.  These risers come in a gloss black powder coated finish or a show chrome finish.  These accept the factory 1/2-13 bolts and utilize your factory top clamp.  

Perfect Riser for our Speedster Bars

name: 8" Forged Aluminum Risers For 1" Bars
description:
Made from high quality 6061 forged aluminum.  These risers come in a gloss black powder coated finish or a show chrome finish.  These accept the factory 1/2-13 bolts and utilize your factory top clamp.  

Perfect Riser for our Speedster Bars

name: Arlen Ness Smooth Fairing Kit
description: This is the OG Arlen Ness Fairing Kit.  Designed originally for the narrow glide front end found on DX's and Sportsters.  The fairing can easily be modified to fit the newer Mid-Glide front end found on 2006 and newer Street Bobs and Super Glides.  Fairing is smooth & comes with a generic mounting kit for 39mm forks.  (Fairing Has Been Modified For A Mid Glide Front End On The Bike Shown In The Pictures)

name: Arlen Ness Original Louvered Fairing Kit
description: This is the OG Arlen Ness Fairing Kit.  Designed originally for the narrow glide front end found on DX's and Sportsters.  The fairing can easily be modified to fit the newer Mid-Glide front end found on 2006 and newer Street Bobs and Super Glides.  Fairing is louvered & comes with a generic mounting kit for 39mm forks.  (Fairing Has Been Modified For A Mid Glide Front End On The Bike Shown In The Pictures)

name: Harley Davidson 49mm Quick Detachable Fairing / Windshield Clamp
description: If you have a 2006 and newer Dyna with 49mm fork tubes, these clamps are what you need to mount your fairing to your fork tubes.  If you are purchasing these to mount your Quarter Fairing Kit, you will need to purchase a quantity of four (4).  Price is per clamp.

name: Bung King Quarter Fairing Adapter Kit  - Mid Glide (49mm) Front Ends
description: If you have a 2006 and newer Dyna Super Glide, Street Bob or Low Rider, then this is the fairing mount adapter kit that you need to adapt the Harley Davidson Quarter Fairing Kit to your motorcycle.  Use this adapter bracket along with your choice of 49mm clamps to mount your Quarter fairing directly to your bike.

name: Quarter Fairing Kit - Primed
description: Genuine Harley Davidson Quarter Fairing Kit - Primer Gray.  Why wait 4-6 Weeks?  Comes complete exactly as you would get it from Harley.  This is an OG fairing....not a knock-off.  Easily make it detachable by ordering our quick detachable clamps....39mm for pre 06 Dynas & Sportsters or 49mm clamps for 06 and newer bikes.  If you have a narrow-glide front end, this fairing will bolt right on.  If you have a mid-glide front end (49mm 2006+ dyna) you will need a Bung King adapter kit sold separately.

name: Works Performance 13 Inch Dual Rate Tracker Shocks
description: Want a great handling bike without sacrificing ride quality? Works has created the perfect shock for Dynas. These new dual spring rate shocks are 13" long and have two springs. A primary spring and a helper spring. The helper spring absorbs the sag and small bumps and the main spring is a higher rate to keep the bike stable over larger bumps and aggresive riding. These will bolt right on to 1991-Current model year bikes.

name: Works Performance Black Tracker Shocks - 12.6" Length
description: These shocks are nitrogen filled and are very light weight. If you want a killer handling bike with good looks then these are the shocks you want on your bike. These single rate spring shocks feature an adjustable spring preload perch for fine tuning the sag settings for your weight.

name: Works Black Tracker 11.6" Lowered Shocks
description: These shocks are nitrogen filled and are very light weight. If you want a killer handling bike with good looks then these are the shocks you want on your bike. These single rate spring shocks feature an adjustable spring preload perch for fine tuning the sag settings for your weight.

name: Vintage Style Bobber Grips
description: Need a cool set of grips that are retro and simple....Nice, comfortable and functional?...If you are in search of a retro set of grips...these are what you need.

name: ThunderHeader 06 Up Dyna
description: Best sounding pipe you can put on your bike, hands down. People who build motors know that a Thunder Header makes power and torque. Ceramic coated black or Chrome finish. Price includes heat shields. FITS 2006 & NEWER DYNA MODELS WITH FORWARD OR MID CONTROLS.

name: Rocket Bobs Cycle Works 6" Zombie Handlebars
description: 6" Rocket Bobs Cycle Works handlebars made exclusively for us without the drilled crossbar. Pete from Rocket Bobs builds some killer products. We have teamed up with the wanker from across the pond to offer some killer prices on his parts....no expensive shipping to pay, no exhange rates to worry about! These bars are made from surgical grade stainless steel and then powder coated a deep gloss black. 6" of rise and 3" of pullback and 32" width. These bars were designed around the Mid-Glide front end found on most newer Dyna models.....they are pictured here with a wide glide front end.

name: Progressive Slam Kit - '06-CURRENT Dynas
description: We decided to come up with the best kit possible to lower your '06-'11 Dyna. We combined the Progressive "Drop-In" front lowering kit with Progressive's 11" rear lowering shocks. This kit will lower your bike up to 2" in the front and up to 1.75" in the rear. This is a popular kit and you save money by buying the kit as one.

name: Progressive Drop-In Fork Springs '06-CURRENT Dyna Models
description: Progressive "Drop-In" series front fork lowering system. This is the easiest way to lower your front suspension. Progressive's new kit replaces the original spring and spacer with a "top out" spring and a new progressive rate ride spring. The ride will be nicer on your bike and it will set up to 2" lower.

name: Progressive 11" 412 Series Shocks
description: 11" eyelet length. These will lower a Street bob approximately 3/4 of an inch. They will lower a Super Glide and inch and 3/4. Progressive 412 shocks are nitrogetn gas-charged with multi stage automatic valving and adjustable spring preload.

name: Le Pera Pillion Pad
description: This is the Le Pera Pillion Pad that matches up with the Bare Bones Solo seat in case the need arises to take along a passenger. It is made of the same quality top-grade vinyl as the Bare Bones Solo. This one fits 2006 and newer FXD/FXDWG.

name: Le Pera Daytona Sport Seat 06 Newer Dynas
description: This seat has a low, sleek style that retains back support for maximum rider comfort. It has a molded one-piece foam foundation covered with premium grade vinyl. The seat base is 16-guage powder coated steel and the bottom is carpeted to protect the fender. And...this quality seat is made in the USA. Fits 2006 & Up Dyna Models

name: Le Pera Bare Bones Solo Seat
description: The Bare Bones Solo Seat has the look that brings out the true expression of your custom bike. Even a stock Dyna takes on a whole new look when you add one of these seats. The seat cover is made of top-grade vinyl. The seat base is powder coated steel and is carpeted to protect the rear fender. Le Pera seats are made in the USA. Fits 2006 and newer FXD/FXDWG models.

name: Kuryakyn Panacea Low Profile Tailight With Signals
description: A must if you plan on retaining your factory tailight location. Low profile design and integrated turn signals make this one of the best upgrades you can do to your bike. LED brake light flashes 3 times prior to staying on steadily. Turn signals are arrows. Very nice addition to get your bike headed in the right direction.

name: Kijima 49mm Short Fork Gaiters
description: Simple and effective way to give your front suspension a better look. These fit 2006 and newer dynas with 49mm fork tubes. Will also fit Vrod models. WILL NOT fit Wide Glides. Made in Japan

name: Joker Machine Fork-Mount LED Marker Lights
description: These front turn signals are the easiest way to put trick looking turn signals on your Dyna or V-Rod. LED lights are very bright and noticable....the overall appearance of the turn signal itself is not very noticable....and thats what you want. These bad boys blend into the front end and hide nicely until the super bright LED's come on as a signal to other motorist. Get a pair today and get rid of the fugly factory bullet signals.  Available for 39mm and 49mm options.  Pre 2006 use 39mm and 2006-Current use 49mm.  Anodized Black or Chrome finishes available.

name: Hotop Designs Low Profile Tag Bracket - Dynas & Softails
description: Throw that stock metal tag bracket into the scrap metal pile and replace it with a low profile tag bracket from Hotop Designs. This bracket works on Softail & Dyna fenders that utilize a 3 hole mounting system. The contour of the tag matches the curve of the fender perfectly. A rubber spacer insures that your paint stays protected. Excellent addition to your bike for the money. Available in Black or Chrome.

name: Forbidden Motorcycles Risers
description: Want to run Dirtbike style tapered handlebars on your Harley? Here you go. Jim at Forbidden Motorcycles has created the most kick ass set of risers in the industry. These risers are 3.5" on center for nearly all Harley applications. The clamping area is machined for inch and an eighth handlebars. Handlebar choices are endless and inexpensive.....Pro Taper, Moose, Renthal and Tag are just a few manufacturers of quality dirtbike tapered bars. The risers come with slip on sleeves to adapt your stock perches and control housings. Available in raw form....powder coat them, anodize them, polish them, paint them or just leave them raw.

name: Dyna 10.5" Slammer Shocks 91-11 Dyna Models
description: Burly Slammer shocks offer the lowest ride possible on your 1991 and newer Dyna. These come in black or chrome and are preload adjustable for rider weight. If you want your bike slammed.....this is the way to go.

name: SECC Retro Crossbar Handle Bars
description: These bars have a unique look that helps to separate your bike from the crowd. Similar in construction to the way too expensive Paughco Hollywood bars, made in the USA so they're built to last. These bars have a 6 inch rise, 6 inches of pullback and 32 inches wide. Quality construction and a deep gloss black powder coated finish mean these bars will be around for the long haul. Make your bike unique...order these bars today.

name: CRG 2.5" Hindsight Mirror w/ 1" Bar Adapter
description: When we build bikes, we always look for the little things that bring the bike together.....The last thing we ever want to do is build a thinned out, trimmed down bike and then put a big huge ugly stock mirror back onto it....just doesn't work for us. We have tested several different products over the last few years and can say that this is one of those products that gets the job done, is made with precision and looks great for the function it performs. Its a mirror...You see things behind you...thats what it does...it should be simple. These mirrors are very easy to install and very easy to adjust.

name: Burly Slammer Kit '06-'14 Dyna Models
description: Burly has combined their 10.5" rear shocks with their progressive rate front suspension lowering kit. This kit will lower the bike 2" in the front. If you have a Low Rider or a Street Bob, you bike will be 1.25" inches lower in the rear, and Super Glide owners will achieve a 2.25" drop from the factory ride height.

name: Arlen Ness Big Sucker Stage 1 Air Breather
description: A nice, simple way to make your bike breather better. Easy to install. Comes with a stainless steel jacketed filter that is washable and reusable. Fits 99-06 Twin Cam models with CV carburetor and 01-13 models with Delphi fuel injection. (Does not fit 08-12 Touring model bikes)

name: 2009 & Newer Street Bob Fender Chop
description: Lower the look of your bike without lowering your suspension! We chop your existing fender up and make it cool! The fender is lowered 1" and then radius'd on the side to make it follow the lines of the rear wheel. ***This is a service that we perform to YOUR fender. You must mail us your fender with your contact information, color of bike and a description of which holes you want filled***We DO NOT recommend running shocks shorter than 11.5" with this fender!*** EMAIL US TO SETUP YOUR ORDER PRIOR TO CHECKOUT!  We will give you all of the instructions needed to send us your fender!

name: 3" Bobber Mirror
description: A simple and cost effective way to see behind you....Seriously, who spends hundreds of bucks on mirrors? This is the best looking, most cost effective way to put a mirror on your bike...unless you like the big goofy stock mirrors.... These mirrors come in chrome only....A simple Scotch Brite pad can fix it up quick.

name: Perfect Fit Apes
description:
No bolt on part changes the look of your bike more dramatically than a set of Ape Hangers. The problem is, all other bars are either too narrow or too wide for the 2006 and newer Dynas. Our bars fit the Mid Glide front end perfectly (hence the name). These Apes not only look good on your bike, but are very comfortable as well. 

*****14" BARS:  The Overall Height Is 14". The Grips Drop Down To 12". Pullback is 6". Grip Width is 32" Width At Base is 8.75"...Perfect For The Mid Glide Trees. 

*****12" BARS:  The Overall Height Is 12"  The Grips Drop Down To 10.5".  Pullback is 6".  Grip Width is 32".  Width At Base Is 8.75"...Perfect For The Mid Glide Trees.

OUR 12" BARS WILL WORK PERFECT WITH YOUR FACTORY STREET BOB LENGTH CABLES.  14" BARS WILL REQUIRE A CABLE KIT SOLD SEPARATELY (EMAIL US FOR OPTIONS).

IF YOUR BIKE IS LOWERED IN THE FRONT, YOU MAY NEED A SHORTER BRAKE LINE.

name: "Speedster" Tracker Style Bars
description: We've always loved the comfort and look of the stock FXDX bars but didn't like how wide they were. We decided to design a set of bars that was slightly wider at the base to work with the new Mid-Glide front end, and 2" narrower than the original FXDX bars. These bars have 3.5" of rise, are 30" wide and have 6" of pullback. Combined with 6.5" risers, these bars will work perfect on 06+ Super Glide, Low Rider & Super Glide Custom models and combined with 8" risers, these work perfect on Street Bob models. The ergonomics of these bars on the bike are perfect. (Shown with 8" risers)

name: 13" Straight Club Style T-Bars
description: Our own 13" Rise T-Bars have the perfect Ergonomics. These bars are nice and narrow at only 28" wide! The rise is 13" and the pullback is just over 2". We have bungs welded low on the bars to install custom gauges or to install your factory gauge pod on a Dyna. Clean up the look of your bike and get some killer bars on it! Slotted for internal wiring. Made from heavy gauge steel & powder coated a deep gloss black finish Made in the USA!
